results.text: Let Israel now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
results.textEnhanced: Let Israel now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
texts: Let Israel now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.

results.text: Let Israel say, “His steadfast love endures forever.”
results.textEnhanced: Let Israel say, “His steadfast love endures forever.”
texts: Let Israel say, “His steadfast love endures forever.”
